Tartarus

Moving Day

29 Jan 2019

Today I am moving into a new flat, and it is the 4th time that I have moved out of my parents' with the intention of not returning. I hope it sticks this time, although I am not going to get my hopes up too much. I'm less excited than the previous times, now it feels like business as usual.

I also spent about 6 hours trying to get Ubuntu working on a secondary SSD yesterday to no avail. The install process runs successfully, but open attempting to restart and boot into Ubuntu, my machine hangs when the BIOS hands over to grub. Send help :-(
